name: Joseph Goodwill Perspective
description:
Play as Joseph and fight against Cain and Friends

Also has short shooting minigame like the one in Bashful except YOU are the one shooting Cain insetad of dodging bullets (still proud of this minigame)

Lisa the Bashful by DoYouSellVHS
